title: Newest LoL champion!
body:
Let's play a game--

Generate the newest, OP-est, awesome-est champion to hit the rift since... EVER!

Rules for generating your champion:

**Champion name**-- (anagram of what you had for lunch), the (adjective describing the last show you watched) (dream occupation)

**Champion appearance**-- Use this: http://fantasynamegenerators.com/animal-species-names.php#.Uw_QDvldWSo  (draw it if you're feeling artistic)

**Abilities**-- These will all be in relation to the object nearest your right elbow. This will only generate the names... if you're feeling extra creative you can come up with the mechanics of your abilities!

* **Passive**-- (current state of object) (creative name for object)
* **Q**-- (effect of throwing this object as hard as you can behind you)
* **W**-- (how this object affected your morning)
* **E**-- (Method of mobilizing object [i.e. gap closer])
* **R**-- (How object could potentially hypothetically somehow kill someone)

Excited to see what you guys come up with!

replies.body:
So, here's mine.

**Chaswind, the Mediocre Professor**

He takes the form of a **Sepia-eyed Otter**

**Passive**-- *Unzipped Satchel* : Chaswind collects homework from nearby allied champion. As they spend more time around Chaswind, their grades improve, giving them increased health regeneration and movement speed.

**Q**-- *Angry Coworker* : When an ally buffed by *unzipped satchel* damages an enemy champion, Chaswind gains a stack of *angry coworker*. He can spend all stacks to deal bonus physical damage to the enemy champion based on number of stacks.

**W**-- *Back breaker* : Chaswind makes an enemy champion carry his backpack, slowing them. This slow increases based on the number of nearby ALLIED champions being buffed by *unzipped satchel*

**E**-- *Strap sling* : Chaswind anchors his backpack to a location. After 3 seconds, or on reactivation, he is pulled back to this location.

**R**-- *Workload* : Chas's backpack buries an enemy champion in paperwork, crushing them and causing them to take physical damage as long as they remain in the area
You area God among men my friend, a God among men.

**Unwrapped Dill Shock, the Irrisistable Doctor**

Who takes the form of a **Zebra-Eagle**

**Passive** - Enveloping Warmth: Shields nearby allied champions giving them increased magic resistance. Every 60 seconds if the shield has not been broken, the shielded champion is granted a permanent +0.5 magic resist.

**Q** - Upon hitting an enemy champion, they are slowed for 5 seconds, also inflicting damage over this duration. 

**W** - Grants allied champions additional health and AD for a short duration. All nearby enemy champions are drawn towards Dill Shock. (Think Ahri's "attraction" or "charm", totally forgot which it is")

**E** Dill Shock casts out an electric cloud damaging all enemies in the area.

**R** Dill Shock smothers an enemy champion. Damage is multiplied X2 and is unleashed upon the enemy within 6 seconds unless enemy is able to get out of range.

HAHAHA totally challenging and fun. Thanks for sparking my creative side that is apparently not too creative. Hard to do this in regards to a blanket XD
